vsfPath=window.chihiroToVsfUrl(urlHash);var basePath=location.protocol + '//' + location.host + rootUrl;if(vsfPath === '' || vsfPath.indexOf('?') === 0){basePath = location.protocol + '//' + location.host + location.pathname;}var fullUrl=vsfPath.includes('://')?vsfPath:'' + basePath + vsfPath;window.location.replace(fullUrl);}}catch(e) {window.location.replace(location.protocol + '//' + location.host + location.pathname);}})(window);exports['default'] = {chihiroToVsfUrl:window.chihiroToVsfUrl,getRootUrl:window.getRootUrl};module.exports = exports['default'];
</script>
    
    <div id="sb-social-toolbar-root-placeholder" class="hide"></div>

loadTime=retrieveSessionStorageValue(INITIAL_LOAD_TIME_STORAGE_LABEL);if(event.gctEventClass === 'PageViewEvent' && loadTime){event.eventDataSources.push({loadTime:loadTime});}});concatEventQueue(GCT_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL,shoeboxEvents);var clickEventElements=window.document.querySelectorAll('.banner-click-event');var locationInfo=fetchFromShoebox(GCT_LOCATION_INFO_SHOEBOX_LABEL,[]);clickEventElements.forEach(function(el){el.addEventListener('click',function(click){var bannerId=click.currentTarget.dataset.bannerId;var eventDataSources=[{location:locationInfo.location,locationType:locationInfo.locationType,time:Date.now(),eventData:{banners:[bannerId]},clickType:'click banner',exitClick:false}];try{var gctEvent={gctEventClass:'ClickEvent',eventDataSources:eventDataSources};concatEventQueue(GCT_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL,gctEvent);}catch(e) {window.console.error('Failed to store banner clicks in Fastboot Mode: ' + e.message);}});});})(window);
</script>
    <script>
'use strict';Object.defineProperty(exports,'__esModule',{value:true});(function(window){var GCT_ORIGINAL_REFERRER_LABEL='originalReferrer';window.saveReferrer = function(referrer){var currentStoredReferrer=window.sessionStorage.getItem(GCT_ORIGINAL_REFERRER_LABEL);if(!currentStoredReferrer){try{if(referrer){window.sessionStorage.setItem(GCT_ORIGINAL_REFERRER_LABEL,referrer);}}catch(e) {window.console.error('Could not set original referrer correctly');}}};window.saveReferrer(window.document.referrer);})(window);exports['default'] = window.saveReferrer;module.exports = exports['default'];
</script>

'use strict';(function(window){var REVENUE_ATTR_STORAGE_KEY='revenueAttribution';var NUM_TRANSITIONS_STORAGE_KEY='revenueAttributionNumTransitions';var REVENUE_ATTR_DATA_FIELD='data-revenue-attribution';var oldRevAttrItem=window.sessionStorage.getItem(REVENUE_ATTR_STORAGE_KEY);var oldItemNumTransitions=parseInt(window.sessionStorage.getItem(NUM_TRANSITIONS_STORAGE_KEY),10);if(oldRevAttrItem && oldItemNumTransitions < 1){try{window.sessionStorage.setItem(NUM_TRANSITIONS_STORAGE_KEY,oldItemNumTransitions + 1);}catch(e) {window.console.error('Set Revenue Attribution: Could not update number of transitions in session storage');}}else if(oldRevAttrItem){window.sessionStorage.removeItem(REVENUE_ATTR_STORAGE_KEY);window.sessionStorage.removeItem(NUM_TRANSITIONS_STORAGE_KEY);}var clickListener=function clickListener(){if(!this.attributes[REVENUE_ATTR_DATA_FIELD]){return;}var data=JSON.parse(this.attributes[REVENUE_ATTR_DATA_FIELD].value);if(data){try{window.sessionStorage.setItem(REVENUE_ATTR_STORAGE_KEY,this.attributes[REVENUE_ATTR_DATA_FIELD].value);window.sessionStorage.setItem(NUM_TRANSITIONS_STORAGE_KEY,0);}catch(e) {window.console.error('Set Revenue Attribution: Could not store all revenue attribution data in session storage');window.sessionStorage.removeItem(REVENUE_ATTR_STORAGE_KEY);window.sessionStorage.removeItem(NUM_TRANSITIONS_STORAGE_KEY);}}this.removeEventListener('click',clickListener);};var elements=window.document.querySelectorAll('[' + REVENUE_ATTR_DATA_FIELD + ']');elements.forEach(function(el){return el.addEventListener('click',clickListener);});})(window);
</script>

'use strict';(function(window){var LOGIN_ACTION_STORAGE_KEY='loginAction';var storage=window.sessionStorage;function addLoadingOverlay(){var loadingOverlay=window.document.createElement('DIV');var style='position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; height: 100%; width: 100%; z-index: 300;  cursor: wait;';loadingOverlay.setAttribute('style',style);loadingOverlay.setAttribute('id','loginForActionLoadingOverlay');window.document.body.appendChild(loadingOverlay);}function addManipulationForAction(domManipulator){if(domManipulator){var className=domManipulator.className;var attrName=domManipulator.attrName;var attrValue=domManipulator.attrValue;var elements=window.document.getElementsByClassName(className);var _iteratorNormalCompletion=true;var _didIteratorError=false;var _iteratorError=undefined;try{for(var _iterator=elements[Symbol.iterator](),_step;!(_iteratorNormalCompletion = (_step = _iterator.next()).done);_iteratorNormalCompletion = true) {var element=_step.value;element.setAttribute(attrName,attrValue);}}catch(err) {_didIteratorError = true;_iteratorError = err;}finally {try{if(!_iteratorNormalCompletion && _iterator['return']){_iterator['return']();}}finally {if(_didIteratorError){throw _iteratorError;}}}}}if(storage){try{var loginAction=storage.getItem(LOGIN_ACTION_STORAGE_KEY);if(loginAction){addLoadingOverlay();var domManipulator=JSON.parse(loginAction).domManipulator;addManipulationForAction(domManipulator);}}catch(e) {console.error('Failed to adding loading overlay for login action. </script>

'function';if(canTime){window.performance.mark('indexBottom');window.performance.measure('RENDER_INDEX','navigationStart','indexBottom');var                     <li class="shared-nav__secondary-item"><a id="link-secondary--msg-help-support" class="shared-nav__secondary-anchor shared-nav-anchor dtm-no-track shared-nav-link-icon shared-nav-link-icon--helpandsupport" href="https://support.playstation.com?smcid=other%3Aen-us%3Ablank%3Aprimary%2520nav%3Amsg-help%3Ahelp-support">
                        <span class="shared-nav-icon-text">Help &amp; Support</span>
                      </a></li>
                    <li class="shared-nav__secondary-item"><a id="link-secondary--msg-psn-status" class="shared-nav__secondary-anchor shared-nav-anchor dtm-no-track shared-nav-link-icon shared-nav-link-icon--psnstatus" href="https://status.playstation.com?smcid=other%3Aen-us%3Ablank%3Aprimary%2520nav%3Amsg-help%3Apsn-status">
                        <span class="shared-nav-icon-text">PSN Status</span>
                      </a></li>
                  </ul>
                </div>
              </div>
            </li>
          </ul>
        </div>
      </nav>

loadTime=retrieveSessionStorageValue(INITIAL_LOAD_TIME_STORAGE_LABEL);if(event.gctEventClass === 'PageViewEvent' && loadTime){event.eventDataSources.push({loadTime:loadTime});}});concatEventQueue(GCT_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL,shoeboxEvents);var clickEventElements=window.document.querySelectorAll('.banner-click-event');var locationInfo=fetchFromShoebox(GCT_LOCATION_INFO_SHOEBOX_LABEL,[]);clickEventElements.forEach(function(el){el.addEventListener('click',function(click){var bannerId=click.currentTarget.dataset.bannerId;var eventDataSources=[{location:locationInfo.location,locationType:locationInfo.locationType,time:Date.now(),eventData:{banners:[bannerId]},clickType:'click banner',exitClick:false}];try{var gctEvent={gctEventClass:'ClickEvent',eventDataSources:eventDataSources};concatEventQueue(GCT_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL,gctEvent);}catch(e) {window.console.error('Failed to store banner clicks in Fastboot Mode: ' + e.message);}});});})(window);
</script>
    <script>
'use strict';Object.defineProperty(exports,'__esModule',{value:true});(function(window){var GCT_ORIGINAL_REFERRER_LABEL='originalReferrer';window.saveReferrer = function(referrer){var currentStoredReferrer=window.sessionStorage.getItem(GCT_ORIGINAL_REFERRER_LABEL);if(!currentStoredReferrer){try{if(referrer){window.sessionStorage.setItem(GCT_ORIGINAL_REFERRER_LABEL,referrer);}}catch(e) {window.console.error('Could not set original referrer correctly');}}};window.saveReferrer(window.document.referrer);})(window);exports['default'] = window.saveReferrer;module.exports = exports['default'];
</script>

chihiroPath=urlHash.substr(0,hasQueryString?queryStringStart:urlHash.length);var queryString=hasQueryString?urlHash.substr(queryStringStart + 1):'';for(var i=0;i < urlMappings.length;i += 1) {var 'use strict';(function(window){var GCT_EVENTS_SHOEBOX_LABEL='gctEvents';var GCT_LOCATION_INFO_SHOEBOX_LABEL='gctLocationInfo';var GCT_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL='gctFastbootEventQueue';var CLAIRVOYANCE_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL='clairvoyanceFastbootEventQueue';var INITIAL_LOAD_TIME_STORAGE_LABEL='initialLoadTime';var setSessionStorageValue=function setSessionStorageValue(label,newQueue){try{window.sessionStorage.setItem(label,JSON.stringify(newQueue));}catch(e) {window.console.error('Failed to store session queue in Fastboot Mode: ' + e.message);}};var retrieveSessionStorageValue=function retrieveSessionStorageValue(label){try{var sessionJson=window.sessionStorage.getItem(label);return JSON.parse(sessionJson);}catch(e) {window.console.error('Failed to retrieve session queue in Fastboot Mode: ' + e.message);}return null;};var retrieveEventQueue=function retrieveEventQueue(label){return retrieveSessionStorageValue(label) || [];};var concatEventQueue=function concatEventQueue(label){var events=arguments.length <= 1 || arguments[1] === undefined?[]:arguments[1];var sessionEvents=retrieveEventQueue(label);setSessionStorageValue(label,sessionEvents.concat(events));};var fetchFromShoebox=function fetchFromShoebox(label,def){var eventsShoeboxNode=window.document.querySelector('#shoebox-' + label);if(eventsShoeboxNode && eventsShoeboxNode.text){try{return JSON.parse(eventsShoeboxNode.text);}catch(e) {window.console.error('Failed to fetch shoebox ' + label + ' in Fastboot Mode: ' + e.message);}}return def;};var canTime=window.performance && typeof window.performance.mark === 'function' && typeof window.performance.measure === 'function' && typeof window.performance.getEntriesByName === 'function';if(canTime){window.performance.mark('indexBottom');window.performance.measure('RENDER_INDEX','navigationStart','indexBottom');var loadTime=(window.performance.getEntriesByName('RENDER_INDEX')[0] || {}).duration;var initialLoadTime=retrieveSessionStorageValue(INITIAL_LOAD_TIME_STORAGE_LABEL);if(!initialLoadTime){setSessionStorageValue(INITIAL_LOAD_TIME_STORAGE_LABEL,loadTime);}concatEventQueue(CLAIRVOYANCE_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL,{name:'RENDER_INDEX',time:Date.now() - 1,loadTime:loadTime});}var shoeboxEvents=fetchFromShoebox(GCT_EVENTS_SHOEBOX_LABEL,[]);shoeboxEvents.forEach(function(event){event.eventDataSources.push({time:Date.now()});var loadTime=retrieveSessionStorageValue(INITIAL_LOAD_TIME_STORAGE_LABEL);if(event.gctEventClass === 'PageViewEvent' && loadTime){event.eventDataSources.push({loadTime:loadTime});}});concatEventQueue(GCT_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL,shoeboxEvents);var clickEventElements=window.document.querySelectorAll('.banner-click-event');var locationInfo=fetchFromShoebox(GCT_LOCATION_INFO_SHOEBOX_LABEL,[]);clickEventElements.forEach(function(el){el.addEventListener('click',function(click){var bannerId=click.currentTarget.dataset.bannerId;var eventDataSources=[{location:locationInfo.location,locationType:locationInfo.locationType,time:Date.now(),eventData:{banners:[bannerId]},clickType:'click banner',exitClick:false}];try{var gctEvent={gctEventClass:'ClickEvent',eventDataSources:eventDataSources};concatEventQueue(GCT_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL,gctEvent);}catch(e) {window.console.error('Failed to store banner clicks in Fastboot Mode: ' + e.message);}});});})(window);
</script>
    <script>

    <script>

'use strict';(function(window){var REVENUE_ATTR_STORAGE_KEY='revenueAttribution';var NUM_TRANSITIONS_STORAGE_KEY='revenueAttributionNumTransitions';var REVENUE_ATTR_DATA_FIELD='data-revenue-attribution';var oldRevAttrItem=window.sessionStorage.getItem(REVENUE_ATTR_STORAGE_KEY);var oldItemNumTransitions=parseInt(window.sessionStorage.getItem(NUM_TRANSITIONS_STORAGE_KEY),10);if(oldRevAttrItem && oldItemNumTransitions < 1){try{window.sessionStorage.setItem(NUM_TRANSITIONS_STORAGE_KEY,oldItemNumTransitions + 1);}catch(e) {window.console.error('Set Revenue Attribution: Could not update number of transitions in session storage');}}else if(oldRevAttrItem){window.sessionStorage.removeItem(REVENUE_ATTR_STORAGE_KEY);window.sessionStorage.removeItem(NUM_TRANSITIONS_STORAGE_KEY);}var clickListener=function clickListener(){if(!this.attributes[REVENUE_ATTR_DATA_FIELD]){return;}var data=JSON.parse(this.attributes[REVENUE_ATTR_DATA_FIELD].value);if(data){try{window.sessionStorage.setItem(REVENUE_ATTR_STORAGE_KEY,this.attributes[REVENUE_ATTR_DATA_FIELD].value);window.sessionStorage.setItem(NUM_TRANSITIONS_STORAGE_KEY,0);}catch(e) {window.console.error('Set Revenue Attribution: Could not store all revenue attribution data in session storage');window.sessionStorage.removeItem(REVENUE_ATTR_STORAGE_KEY);window.sessionStorage.removeItem(NUM_TRANSITIONS_STORAGE_KEY);}}this.removeEventListener('click',clickListener);};var elements=window.document.querySelectorAll('[' + REVENUE_ATTR_DATA_FIELD + ']');elements.forEach(function(el){return el.addEventListener('click',clickListener);});})(window);
</script>

'use strict';(function(window){var LOGIN_ACTION_STORAGE_KEY='loginAction';var storage=window.sessionStorage;function addLoadingOverlay(){var loadingOverlay=window.document.createElement('DIV');var style='position: fixed; top: 0; left: 0; height: 100%; width: 100%; z-index: 300;  cursor: wait;';loadingOverlay.setAttribute('style',style);loadingOverlay.setAttribute('id','loginForActionLoadingOverlay');window.document.body.appendChild(loadingOverlay);}function addManipulationForAction(domManipulator){if(domManipulator){var className=domManipulator.className;var attrName=domManipulator.attrName;var attrValue=domManipulator.attrValue;var elements=window.document.getElementsByClassName(className);var _iteratorNormalCompletion=true;var _didIteratorError=false;var _iteratorError=undefined;try{for(var _iterator=elements[Symbol.iterator](),_step;!(_iteratorNormalCompletion = (_step = _iterator.next()).done);_iteratorNormalCompletion = true) {var element=_step.value;element.setAttribute(attrName,attrValue);}}catch(err) {_didIteratorError = true;_iteratorError = err;}finally {try{if(!_iteratorNormalCompletion && _iterator['return']){_iterator['return']();}}finally {if(_didIteratorError){throw _iteratorError;}}}}}if(storage){try{var loginAction=storage.getItem(LOGIN_ACTION_STORAGE_KEY);if(loginAction){addLoadingOverlay();var domManipulator=JSON.parse(loginAction).domManipulator;addManipulationForAction(domManipulator);}}catch(e) {console.error('Failed to adding loading overlay for login action. Error: ' + e);}}})(window);
</script>

'function';if(canTime){window.performance.mark('indexBottom');window.performance.measure('RENDER_INDEX','navigationStart','indexBottom');var loadTime=(window.performance.getEntriesByName('RENDER_INDEX')[0] || {}).duration;var loadTime=retrieveSessionStorageValue(INITIAL_LOAD_TIME_STORAGE_LABEL);if(event.gctEventClass === 'PageViewEvent' && loadTime){event.eventDataSources.push({loadTime:loadTime});}});concatEventQueue(GCT_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL,shoeboxEvents);var clickEventElements=window.document.querySelectorAll('.banner-click-event');var locationInfo=fetchFromShoebox(GCT_LOCATION_INFO_SHOEBOX_LABEL,[]);clickEventElements.forEach(function(el){el.addEventListener('click',function(click){var bannerId=click.currentTarget.dataset.bannerId;var eventDataSources=[{location:locationInfo.location,locationType:locationInfo.locationType,time:Date.now(),eventData:{banners:[bannerId]},clickType:'click banner',exitClick:false}];try{var gctEvent={gctEventClass:'ClickEvent',eventDataSources:eventDataSources};concatEventQueue(GCT_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL,gctEvent);}catch(e) {window.console.error('Failed to store banner clicks in Fastboot Mode: ' + e.message);}});});})(window);
</script>
    <script>
'use strict';Object.defineProperty(exports,'__esModule',{value:true});(function(window){var GCT_ORIGINAL_REFERRER_LABEL='originalReferrer';window.saveReferrer = function(referrer){var currentStoredReferrer=window.sessionStorage.getItem(GCT_ORIGINAL_REFERRER_LABEL);if(!currentStoredReferrer){try{if(referrer){window.sessionStorage.setItem(GCT_ORIGINAL_REFERRER_LABEL,referrer);}}catch(e) {window.console.error('Could not set original referrer correctly');}}};window.saveReferrer(window.document.referrer);})(window);exports['default'] = window.saveReferrer;module.exports = exports['default'];
</script>

chihiroPath=urlHash.substr(0,hasQueryString?queryStringStart:urlHash.length);var queryString=hasQueryString?urlHash.substr(queryStringStart + 1):'';for(var i=0;i < urlMappings.length;i += 1) {var     <script>
'use strict';(function(window){var GCT_EVENTS_SHOEBOX_LABEL='gctEvents';var GCT_LOCATION_INFO_SHOEBOX_LABEL='gctLocationInfo';var GCT_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL='gctFastbootEventQueue';var CLAIRVOYANCE_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL='clairvoyanceFastbootEventQueue';var INITIAL_LOAD_TIME_STORAGE_LABEL='initialLoadTime';var setSessionStorageValue=function setSessionStorageValue(label,newQueue){try{window.sessionStorage.setItem(label,JSON.stringify(newQueue));}catch(e) {window.console.error('Failed to store session queue in Fastboot Mode: ' + e.message);}};var retrieveSessionStorageValue=function retrieveSessionStorageValue(label){try{var sessionJson=window.sessionStorage.getItem(label);return JSON.parse(sessionJson);}catch(e) {window.console.error('Failed to retrieve session queue in Fastboot Mode: ' + e.message);}return null;};var retrieveEventQueue=function retrieveEventQueue(label){return retrieveSessionStorageValue(label) || [];};var concatEventQueue=function concatEventQueue(label){var events=arguments.length <= 1 || arguments[1] === undefined?[]:arguments[1];var sessionEvents=retrieveEventQueue(label);setSessionStorageValue(label,sessionEvents.concat(events));};var fetchFromShoebox=function fetchFromShoebox(label,def){var eventsShoeboxNode=window.document.querySelector('#shoebox-' + label);if(eventsShoeboxNode && eventsShoeboxNode.text){try{return JSON.parse(eventsShoeboxNode.text);}catch(e) {window.console.error('Failed to fetch shoebox ' + label + ' in Fastboot Mode: ' + e.message);}}return def;};var canTime=window.performance && typeof window.performance.mark === 'function' && typeof window.performance.measure === 'function' && typeof window.performance.getEntriesByName === 'function';if(canTime){window.performance.mark('indexBottom');window.performance.measure('RENDER_INDEX','navigationStart','indexBottom');var loadTime=(window.performance.getEntriesByName('RENDER_INDEX')[0] || {}).duration;var initialLoadTime=retrieveSessionStorageValue(INITIAL_LOAD_TIME_STORAGE_LABEL);if(!initialLoadTime){setSessionStorageValue(INITIAL_LOAD_TIME_STORAGE_LABEL,loadTime);}concatEventQueue(CLAIRVOYANCE_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL,{name:'RENDER_INDEX',time:Date.now() - 1,loadTime:loadTime});}var shoeboxEvents=fetchFromShoebox(GCT_EVENTS_SHOEBOX_LABEL,[]);shoeboxEvents.forEach(function(event){event.eventDataSources.push({time:Date.now()});var loadTime=retrieveSessionStorageValue(INITIAL_LOAD_TIME_STORAGE_LABEL);if(event.gctEventClass === 'PageViewEvent' && loadTime){event.eventDataSources.push({loadTime:loadTime});}});concatEventQueue(GCT_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL,shoeboxEvents);var clickEventElements=window.document.querySelectorAll('.banner-click-event');var locationInfo=fetchFromShoebox(GCT_LOCATION_INFO_SHOEBOX_LABEL,[]);clickEventElements.forEach(function(el){el.addEventListener('click',function(click){var bannerId=click.currentTarget.dataset.bannerId;var eventDataSources=[{location:locationInfo.location,locationType:locationInfo.locationType,time:Date.now(),eventData:{banners:[bannerId]},clickType:'click banner',exitClick:false}];try{var gctEvent={gctEventClass:'ClickEvent',eventDataSources:eventDataSources};concatEventQueue(GCT_EVENT_QUEUE_STORAGE_LABEL,gctEvent);}catch(e) {window.console.error('Failed to store banner clicks in Fastboot Mode: ' + e.message);}});});})(window);
</script>
    <script>
'use strict';Object.defineProperty(exports,'__esModule',{value:true});(function(window){var GCT_ORIGINAL_REFERRER_LABEL='originalReferrer';window.saveReferrer = function(referrer){var currentStoredReferrer=window.sessionStorage.getItem(GCT_ORIGINAL_REFERRER_LABEL);if(!currentStoredReferrer){try{if(referrer){window.sessionStorage.setItem(GCT_ORIGINAL_REFERRER_LABEL,referrer);}}catch(e) {window.console.error('Could not set original referrer correctly');}}};window.saveReferrer(window.document.referrer);})(window);exports['default'] = window.saveReferrer;module.exports = exports['default'];
</script>
